params.message: BUILD YOUR CITY. The world is crying out for a savior. It calls you! Stand up and fight for freedom! Restore order and bring back hope to a dying world! For the greater good, you have to join the war and lead the future army, train robot soldiers and build future war machines to liberate your city and the world! Find allies and recruit powerful heroes around you! Use their unique talents to enhance yours. Rebuild your city, lead your people and win the war! This is your cyberwar! The final battle to protect human civilization!
